content.p: To register for the conference, please complete the form below and click submit. If you plan to pay be cheque, you can instead fill in one of the downloadable forms and post it to address shown on the form. Please submit your abstract if you wish to present a talk or poster. Rates, which include lunch and coffee, are as follows: Earlybird rate (before 22nd September): RM30 Late registration (after 22nd September): RM40 On-site registration (on the day, cash only): RM50 Registration form (printable pdf) Registration form (editable MS Word .docx) This form is currently offline and will reappear shortly. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
